ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 3
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: The Animated Celebration Presents The Scheimer Barrier
ComicInfo.Summary: The celebration of the 50-year anniversary of Star Trek: The Animated Series continues as the mad scientist Fontana collides a hapless Kirk and Spock with a rapid succession of other Star Trek crews from past, present, and future in a bit of diabolical fun! Will our heroes be able to survive? (Editor’s note: This comic book has the record for most first pages of any comic! Confused? Buy a copy and find out what we mean!)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 16:59:41. [CVDB1017477]
ComicInfo.Characters: Brad Boimler, Christopher Pike, D'Vana Tendi, Fontana, Geordi La Forge, James T. Kirk, Jean-Luc Picard, M'Ress, Michael Burnham, Number One, Nyota Uhura, Saru, Spock, William Riker, Worf
ComicInfo.Teams: Cerritos Crew, Enterprise Crew, Enterprise D Crew, Starfleet, USS Discovery Crew
